description: Number of "coherent" reduced decompositions for the longest permutation n n-1 n-2 ... 3 2 1 in the symmetric group on n letters.
comments: For definition of "coherent", see L J. Billera and B. Sturmfels link.
links: L. J. Billera and B. Sturmfels, Iterated fiber polytopes, Mathematika, 41 (1994), no. 2, 348-363.
author: Victor Reiner (reiner(AT)math.umn.edu)
